name: A Mayor Problem
description:
"The laws of space and time have flown out the window... Literally! Now you, the Mayor of the universe must go on a mission to restore the law book and return order to the universe."

1 amazing hub area to explore!
4 unique worlds!
16 Levels with crazy gimmicks!
48 Pages to collect!
7 outfits to unlock!

3D platformer developed by team Shockwave at The Game Assembly.

Credits:
Art
Henrik Andersson - Maximilian Bergström - Pontus Canbäck - Dennis Praetorius 

Level Design
Jonas Astberg - Hannes Bensryd - Oscar Maris

Programming

Technical Art
Adam Andersson - Nathalie Börgesen - Dan Sönne
